title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, May 25, 2022
description: “People tend to blame a writer for writing something they’re too stupid to understand.” – Jamaica Kincaid, celebrating her 73rd birthday today.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “People tend to blame a writer for writing something they’re too stupid to understand.” – Jamaica Kincaid, celebrating her 73rd birthday today.
